reviews.review_text: This is definitely the food we want to try in Goa. Very local very tasty, but the location is a bit secluded, not so many people will find it. What a pity. In opposite direction of the restaurant, you find another restaurant that has live show and luxury interior but the food was worst than here. I recommend you try local Goan food here! You wonâ€™t disappoint.

THE FOODY GOANS restaurant, run by Ajgaonkar family in Campal very close to Kala Academy.

Pravin and his mom are the main chef's behind this flavourful thali and Ranjana manages everything very well. This trio works together to serve fresh, home cooked food to everyone. Their Moto "Eat Well...Live Well" is a perfect example of how we locals cherish our staple food here in Goa.

Pravin is an absolute example to his generation. He has completed his course in hotel management and also had been offered a good job at a reputed 5 star hotel in Panjim but instead he chose self employment and along with his Mom and Sister started this beautiful restaurant.

We loved each and every dish we ordered and the weather was a cherry on top of the cake.

Rates ( very reasonable and budget friendly)
Fish Thali Lepo -  150/-
Rawa fried Prawns - 300/- for 10 good size pieces.
Kingfish Thali - 250/-
Bangda Thali - 130/-
Modso Thali - 200/-
Reshad Masala Bangda - 100/-
Goan Chicken Xacuti - 200/-
Veg Thali - 100/-
Phulkas (must order)

Timings - From 9:00 am to 9:00 pm

Visit this place for awesome home style meals and a lot more.

Watch the full vlog:
https://youtu.be/06d-lRchSVg?feature=shared

#goa #besttimetovisitgoa #rainsingoa #fishfry #family #bestrestaurant #goasbestrestaurant #campal #kalaacademy #fishcurry #bestfishthaliingoa #fishthaliingoa #ashsayzso

Very very disappointed and hurt. Very poor quality of food. This restaurant's charm has degraded completely and no one cares, they are just doing their duty. The rice was damn cold and every item was not fresh Very bad bland vibes. The worst thali I have ever eaten. Why couldn't they serve it with warmth and care? The waiter is on mobile phone, the owner doesn't care. Very sad. Came with so many hopes reading reviews but will not come back again.
